title: Gluten-free loaf
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) brown rice flour', '200g (7 oz) potato starch', '100g (3½ oz) soya flour', '1 tsp salt', '1 sachet easy-blend dried yeast, about 7 g', '1½ tsp honey', '1 tsp extra virgin olive oil', '400ml (14 fl oz) hand-hot water', '1 tsp bicarbonate of soda', '2 tsp cream of tartar']
